title: Virtual Friend app
description: A web app that you can interact with a virtual friend. This was before ChatGPT came out.

links.description: Click to download the prototype off GitHub
You can also view it live here

title: Budgeting app
description: A web app that you can input all my habits and generates transactions for any date range based off the habits you input.

links.description: Click to download the prototype off GitHub

title: Beaming video
description: I made a beaming video in Blender after one month of making it. I 3D modeled the transported controls and made the effects all in Blender. I beamed from my bedroom to my therapy office.

links.description: You can view the video on YouTube here

title: Blob man video
description: I made a blob man video in Blender and 3D modeled the blob man and the walking animation guided by a tutorial on Udemy

links.description: You can view the video on YouTube here

title: Harry Potter currency converter
description: I made a Harry Potter currency converter for the Ti-84 Plus graphing calculator that converts between Dollars and Gallions and vice versa. I created a lot of versions of it and coded it in Ti Basic.

images.description: Harry Potter currency converter color screenshot

links.description: You can download the latest completed version here. Version 7.3

title: Beautiful Mind - VR Teleportation Watch Interface
description: Collaborated on the Beautiful Mind VR app, contributing to the design and implementation of a teleportation watch interface. This feature allowed users to navigate virtual environments seamlessly through an intuitive spatial UI. The project deepened my experience with immersive user interactions and highlighted the potential of VR for innovative solutions. Technologies used included Unity and C#.

images.description: A screenshot of the watch I created
